column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The goat cheese and pasta bravas were delicious. The scallops were fishy
column2: not what I'd call the best. The chicken empanadas were flaky and mediocre tasting. The pruno wine description sounds ridiculously made up - it tastes like most other wines. The paella was okay. The red and white sangrias were really good. However
column3: the service is five stars from all their staff!!
